system.novice: Navigator causes area within with radius of 5m x Perception Bonus to fall into a Warp Lull where Psykers have -10 to all Focus Power Tests, and all Daemons who end their turns within the area make +0 Toughness Tests or are Stunned for 1 Round. This area lasts  for 2 Rounds + 1 per DoF on Test, or whenever the Navigator chooses to dismiss it as a Free Action at the start of their turn. At the end of a turn where the area is active, the Navigator makes a +0 Toughness Tesr or gains one Fatigue.
system.adept: As Novice, but Psykers do not add any bonus from Psy Rating to Focus Power Tests, and Daemons who fail their Toughness Tests suffer 1d5+Perception Bonus Energy Damage that Ignores Armour, Toughness, and Daemonic Trait.
system.master: As Adept, but Warp Lull lasts four rounds, +2 per Degree of Success on Willpower Test.
